author: Special Correspondent
text:
Jeeva (49) of Thekkampatti near Mettupalayam, a lorry driver in Somayampalayam area near Thadagam, was on Monday evening trampled to death by a lone tusker.

It is learnt that the elephant was on the move at brick kilns in Somayanur, Pannimadai, Thadagam, Chinnathadagam, Kanuvai and Dhaliyur areas for the palm tree reefs used to bake brick cakes. Around evening, the victim encountered the elephant and it trampled him to death.
title: Elephant tramples man to death
